unittitle_ssm: Battle of Long Island, Maryland soldiers memorial collection
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of material spanning the period 1869 to 1957 and relating to the commemoration of the 250 Maryland soldiers who were killed defending the retreat of the Continental Army during the Battle of Long Island.
corpname_ssm: United States. Continental Army. Maryland Regiment, 1st (1777-1780)
